mapper.select: select * from parameter order by parametername asc
mapper.insert: insert into parameter(category, pType, parametername, description, pOrder, clause_id) values(#{category}, #{pType}, #{parameterName}, #{description}, #{pOrder}, #{clause_id})
mapper.update: update parameter set category=#{category}, pType=#{pType}, paremetername=#{parameterName}, description=#{description}, pOrder={pOrder}, clause_id=#{clause_id} where parameter_id=#{paremeter_id}
